title: Cognitive skill transfer strategies for adult leadership competency enhancement: Applying learner control and exploratory learning

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of organizational management theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: VR simulation optimized for mobile devices, emphasizing collaborative activities among learners, and structured with tasks based on real-world work scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can apply situational decision-making processes with an accuracy of 80% or higher through VR simulations.
Learners derive creative strategies to solve complex work problems with a completion rate of 70% or higher in exploratory learning environments.
Learners build personalized learning paths by performing three or more iterative self-regulated learning activities in a learner-controlled system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
